dt-option.description: Detail the action that will be taken when the drop down menu for the pagination length option is changed. The token `string _MENU_` is replaced with a default select list of 10, 25, 50 and 100 (or any other value specified by `dt-init lengthMenu`), and can be replaced with a custom select list if required.
dt-option.name: language.lengthMenu

example.title: Language and options change (you'd be better off useing `lengthMenu` though!
